name: py-schema-salad

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Schema Annotations for Linked Avro Data (SALAD)

dependencies.name: py-black
dependencies.description:
Black is the uncompromising Python code formatter. By using it, you
agree to cede control over minutiae of hand-formatting. In return, Black
gives you speed, determinism, and freedom from pycodestyle nagging about
formatting.

dependencies.name: py-cachecontrol
dependencies.description:
CacheControl is a port of the caching algorithms in httplib2 for use
with requests session object.

dependencies.name: py-mistune
dependencies.description: A sane Markdown parser with useful plugins and renderers.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-rdflib
dependencies.description:
RDFLib is a pure Python package for working with RDF. RDFLib contains
most things you need to work with RDF, including: parsers and
serializers for RDF/XML, N3, NTriples, N-Quads, Turtle, TriX, Trig and
JSON-LD (via a plugin). a Graph interface which can be backed by any one
of a number of Store implementations store implementations for in-memory
storage and persistent storage on top of the Berkeley DB a SPARQL 1.1
implementation - supporting SPARQL 1.1 Queries and Update statements

dependencies.name: py-ruamel-yaml
dependencies.description:
a YAML parser/emitter that supports roundtrip preservation of comments,
seq/map flow style, and map key order

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependent_to.name: py-cwl-utils
dependent_to.description:
Python Utilities and Autogenerated Classes for loading and parsing CWL
v1.0, CWL v1.1, and CWL v1.2 documents.

dependent_to.name: py-cwl-upgrader
dependent_to.description: Common Workflow Language standalone document upgrader
